00032 /**
00033  * \file
00034  *         A MAC framer is responsible for constructing and parsing
00035  *         the header in MAC frames. At least the sender and receiver
00036  *         are required to be encoded in the MAC frame headers.
00037  * \author
00038  *         Niclas Finne <nfi@sics.se>
00039  *         Joakim Eriksson <joakime@sics.se>
00040  */
00041 
00042 #ifndef __FRAMER_H__
00043 #define __FRAMER_H__
00044 
00045 struct framer {
00046 
00047   int (* create)(void);
00048   int (* parse)(void);
00049 
00050 };
00051 
00052 #endif /* __FRAMER_H__ */
